name: Family Rescue
description:
This is my 1st complete or released game and it was create a few years ago. I made this game for learning how to make a game, so maybe this game have a bad story, gameplay, graphics, etc. Also you will find some audio or images that are familiar to you. Oh! And sorry because this game only have 1 language which it is Bahasa Indonesia. Because I didn't backup project files from my broken laptop.

How to Play?

You just need to go to the exit sign for going to the next level.

Arrow Button - Moving your character

Space - Use a gun

Enter - Open the chest

E - At level 59 you can take a gas and use a gas at generator

R - At level 59 you can drop a gas

NOTE!

Everytime you run the game, you have to click the "Load" button or you will lose your track data after you quit the game.

I hope you guys enjoy this game!
